title: Pressure cooker beef stew
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 small onion, diced', '1kg (2 1/4 lb) beef stewing meat, cubed', '225ml (8 fl oz) beef stock', '225ml (8 fl oz) water', '5 carrots, peeled and diced', '1 dessertspoon salt, or to taste', '8 medium baking potatoes, peeled and diced', '1 dessertspoon cornflour']
